ALK.caption: NFT Contract Address
ALK.doc: The smart contract address of the NFTs being claimed.
ALK.name: nft_contract_address

ALL.caption: Presale Price
ALL.doc: The price per NFT during the presale phase. Leave empty if you checked no on presale.
ALL.name: presale_price

ALM.caption: Presale Quantity
ALM.doc: The total amount of NFTs that can be claimed by everyone in the presale phase. Leave empty if you checked no on presale.
ALM.name: presale_quantity

ALN.caption: Public Sale Price
ALN.doc: The price per NFT during the public sale phase.
ALN.name: public_sale_price

ALO.caption: Public Sale Start
ALO.doc: Use a date and time picker to allow the user to choose when the public sale will start. The presale will automatically end when the public starts.
ALO.name: hours_until_public_sale

ALP.caption: Presale Start
ALP.doc: Use a date and time picker to allow the user to choose when the presale will start. Leave empty if you checked no on presale.
ALP.name: hours_until_presale

ALQ.caption: Currency
ALQ.doc: The contract address that the token that will be used to claim this NFT.
ALQ.name: currency

ALR.caption: Whitelist Addresses
ALR.doc: Pass in a list of texts to this field, each text will be a whitelisted wallet address. If presale is checked yes and whitelist is checked yes, the whitelist will be active for the presale. If presale is checked no and whitelist is checked yes the whitelist will be active for the public sale.
ALR.name: whitelist

ASb.caption: Presale
ASb.doc: Yes, to have a presale phase before your public mint.
ASb.name: presale

ASc.caption: Whitelist
ASc.doc: If presale is checked yes and whitelist is checked yes, the whitelist will be active for the presale. If presale is checked no and whitelist is checked yes the whitelist will be active for the public sale.
ASc.name: whitelist_y_n
